definition: way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: That is why they did not sell their land.
sentences.chinese: 他们吃法老所给的常俸，所以他们不卖自己的地。

sentences.english: In our province, the most common Chifa is Tangchaolizai.
sentences.chinese: 在我省，最常见的吃法是糖炒栗子。

sentences.english: Tianjin's "white bread volume, two fried fritters, " This is how one eat?
sentences.chinese: 天津的“白面饼卷上两棵油条”这是怎么个吃法？

sentences.english: Of course, that means you'd be depriving yourself of a lot of pleasurable eating.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这也意味着你就无法享受多种令人愉快的吃法。

sentences.english: Fried New Year cake is an unique method of eating New Year cakes.
sentences.chinese: 炒年糕是年糕的特色吃法。

sentences.english: Tianjin "white bread volume, two fried fritters, " This is how one eat?
sentences.chinese: 天津的“白面饼卷上两棵油条”这是怎么个吃法？

sentences.english: Does this way of eating lead to weight loss?
sentences.chinese: 这种吃法能否起到减肥效果呢？

sentences.english: Well too bad for him, this fool still loves the stuff.
sentences.chinese: 糟糕透了，那个蠢蛋还是喜欢这种吃法。

sentences.english: A tour guide should give some introduction to the etiquettes associated with eating in China.
sentences.chinese: 导游应当向客人介绍中餐的吃法和礼仪。

sentences.english: However the way to eat them is quite democratic: you yourself season the cooked food with salt or pepper.
sentences.chinese: 不过吃法还算民主，任君在原味熟食上撒盐或胡椒面。

sentences.english: Siver fish is delicious food. Two big chub were cooked into six different meals.
sentences.chinese: 银鱼很好吃，两条大鲢鱼被做成了六种不同的吃法。

sentences.english: Soon enough, your diet will simply become the way you eat.
sentences.chinese: 很快，您的饮食习惯就会成为你的习惯吃法。

sentences.english: In the past, the cooking of Wok-Seared Lamb Tripe was different according to different customers.
sentences.chinese: 羊爆肚的吃法在过去很讲究，随顾客的选择。

sentences.english: Butter the corn liberally, eat with relish and lick your fingers when done).
sentences.chinese: 在玉米棒上沾满黄油，吃法随意，吃完舔舔手指。

sentences.english: In daily life, the most common way of cooking them is to fry with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 在平时的生活中，最常见的一种吃法是糖炒栗子。

definition: to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
to be fond of eating/to be gluttonous
salad with dressing/cold vegetables dressed with sauce (e.g. coleslaw)
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
